mapper.select: select * from QUESTIONS order by questionDATE DESC limit #{limit} offset #{offset}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QUESTIONS (QUESTIONCATEGORY, QUESTIONTITLE, QUESTIONCONTENT, QUESTIONPUBLIC, USER_CODE) VALUES (#{questionCategory}, #{questionTitle}, #{questionContent}, #{questionPublic}, #{userCode})
mapper.update: UPDATE QUESTIONS SET QUESTIONCATEGORY = #{questionCategory}, QUESTIONTITLE = #{questionTitle}, QUESTIONCONTENT = #{questionContent}, QUESTIONDATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, QUESTIONPUBLIC = #{questionPublic} WHERE QUESTIONID = #{userCode}
